inclusion.criterion: ASA I-III patients admitted for DL surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Predicted difficult airway, laryngoscopy and intubation time > 30 sec
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy to the drugs used
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has been admitted for DL surgery and does not have any exclusion criteria. He is a previously healthy man with no history of chronic drug or alcohol abuse.
